author: remyroy
content: There seems to have been a few hiccups on the Goerli network in the recent days. This is preventing some faucets from working properly and some people from getting enough GoETH to test their eth2/consensus client on Pyrmont or Prater. We are trying to help people join and test their build. Is there a proper channel for this?

author: remyroy
content: Seems like there is a lot of testing being done on the Goerli network by various entities and it's just getting harder to prevent/restrict abuse on the network and faucets.
